public class MenuCounter
extends netgest.bo.xwc.components.model.Menu

A Menu component that renders an "Outlook style" counter along side the label of the MenuCounter

jcarreira

Field Detail

boql

netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.String> boql
A BOQL expression that supplies the counter value, Eg. 'Select Ebo_Perf where active="1"'

sql

netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.String> sql
An SQL expression that supplies the counter value, Eg: 'Select count(*) from OEbo_Perf'

counterValue

netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.String> counterValue
Value to show in the counter, if the value is to a be fixed value, or binded to a bean property, otherwise use the boql or sql properties

counterMask

netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.String> counterMask
A mask to apply when rendering the counter value Eg: %s (where '%s' is replaced by the value of the counter)

updateInterval

netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Integer> updateInterval
The update interval (in seconds) for the counter
